{docbook}
<highlights>
        <itemizedlist>
          <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.DevelopersReferences.ActivityStream">Activity Stream</link>
            </para>
            <para>Introduction to 2 types of activities and ways to publish them, instructions on how to configure an activity processor, to publish an RSS feed with feedmash and sample code.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.Developers_References.OpenSocial">OpenSocial</link>
            </para>
            <para>Introduction to the OpenSocial standard, supported APIs, REST/RPC API, and instructions on how to configure the security and publish an activity into a space.</para>
          </listitem>
		      <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.Developers_References.People">People</link>
            </para>
            <para>Details of Identity (IdentityProvider and IdentityManager), ProfileListener, Connections, Users connection, and RelationshipListener.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.Developers_References.Spaces">Spaces</link>
            </para>
            <para>Instructions on how to create a space, to add/remove an application from a space, to add a new member to a space, and details of SpaceListenerPlugin.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.Developers_References.Space_widget_tutorial">Space widget tutorial</link>
            </para>
            <para>Introduction to the Space widget, its versions (basic and advanced) and configurations.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.Developers_References.Extend_activities_rendering">Activities rendering</link>
            </para>
            <para>Introduction to Activities rendering, instructions on how to extend the activities.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.Developers_References.XMLProcessor">XMLProcessor component</link>
            </para>
            <para>Instructions on how to change the content of input texts by using and extending the XMLProcessor component and its plugins.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>
              <link linkend="SOCref.Developers_References.How_to_create_i18n_activities">Internationalized activities</link>
            </para>
            <para>Information and detailed steps to internationalize an activity as well to get an internationalized message.
          </para>
          </listitem>
        </itemizedlist>
</highlights>
{docbook}
